html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09062020-11-20,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActDivorce Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Central Registry of Divorce Proceedings Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CENTRAL REGISTRY OF DIVORCE PROCEEDINGS REGULATIONS (CRDP) in order to (1) include a provision defining CRDP's mandate; (2) specify that the information concerning each spouse be provided as of a specific point in time; and (3) ensure that the CRDP Regulations are consistent with the Policy Direction to Modernize the Government of Canada's Sex and Gender information Practices.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0248 Publication Date: 2020-12-09
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Central Registry of Divorce Proceedings Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the CENTRAL REGISTRY OF DIVORCE PROCEEDINGS REGULATIONS (CRDP) in order to (1) include a provision defining CRDP's mandate; (2) specify that the information concerning each spouse be provided as of a specific point in time; and (3) ensure that the CRDP Regulations are consistent with the Policy Direction to Modernize the Government of Canada's Sex and Gender information Practices.
